page.title: 12INTERVIEW WITH EX MAYORESS
page.content: Mrs. Annie Powell was born in Ystrad in 1906. Her father was the head- master of Bodringallt Boys' School. She was taught in large classes where strict discipline was imposed, later herself becoming a school teacher in the Rhondda Valley. At this time the face of the valley was totally differ- ent, with poor roads and little leisure facilities for young people. She took an active interest in politics and became a member of the Communist Party seeking greater equal- ity for the people of her community who lived in poor conditions. Mrs. Annie Powell has worked throughout her political life to improve the social conditions in the Rhondda Valley, and became the first Comm- unist Councillor to be elected Mayor in Great Britain.
